title: Nerf graves ffs
body:
This is season 6 all over again just gutt this abomination jesus 

Why on earth is a jungler who kites all the camps soo tanky? like wheres his niche? he uses ammo ? gee even in between the reloads i find him doing a stupid amount of dmg like his reloads actually give you a window if that was your way of saying that's his window that's bullshit , hes in LCS again as well idk what is so skillful about his sick plays with his linear play style.

You need to make him more vulnerable so he cant walk into our jungle like its his already.

replies.body: its about lethality being strong, so right when he was starting to not get picked anymore, lethlity got buffed, and is good on him.

Or instead of shouting nerf every lethality user seperated.... we could nerf lethality?
All these complains about Talon, Quinn, Graves boil down to one source: lethality.

Nerf lethality and see what to do with these champions afterwards.

ironically @ the post 

people tend to have a linear mentality sayings its the champs fault when in reality its the items with lethality

and same thing vice versa when people think its the items fault but its actually the champion

in this case its just former
who would have ever thought that making a ranged champion thats stronger in melee range than all melees would be a bad idea ...
How bout he becomes an adc again rather then this weird jungler/top lane adc/tank/assassin murder bot.
i mean c'mon they nerfed him a bunch of times already. armor pen is overtuned early game.
I miss old Graves. Was so much better
